MWC.GUI.Tools.Swing

Class MyMetalToolBarUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.plaf.ComponentUI
      • javax.swing.plaf.ToolBarUI
        • javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicToolBarUI
          • MWC.GUI.Tools.Swing.MyBasicToolBarUI
            • MWC.GUI.Tools.Swing.MyMetalToolBarUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.swing.SwingConstants

    public class MyMetalToolBarUI
extends MyBasicToolBarUI
    A Metal Look and Feel implementation of ToolBarUI. This implementation is a "combined" view/controller.

    Version:
    1.19 02/02/00
    Author:
    Jeff Shapiro

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  MyMetalToolBarUI.MetalContainerListener

      protected class  MyMetalToolBarUI.MetalRolloverListener 
      static interface  MyMetalToolBarUI.ToolbarOwner
      embedded interface for objects which are capable of owning a toolbar this is needed for MDI interfaces when it is not clear which document owns the various toolbars
